titles.title: Congratulating the Lambda Chi Alpha Fraternity on the occasion of its 100th Anniversary.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary:
Congratulates the Lambda Chi Alpha Fraternity on the occasion of its 100th Anniversary.
Recognizes its members for their work and dedication to making the fraternity an outstanding and honorable association.
